general.text: The General section provides identifying information about the biomarker.
general.title: General

biomarker_description.text: The Biomarker Description section describes the measured change of the biomarker entity within a specific tissue and disease.
biomarker_description.title: Biomarker Description

components.text: The Components section contains Assessed Entity Type and Assessed Entity ID associated with the biomarker.
components.title: Components

biomarker_components.text: The Components section contains Assessed Entity Type and Assessed Entity ID associated with the biomarker.
biomarker_components.title: Biomarker Components

condition.text: Condition name is provided along with a definition of the disease along with common synonyms of the condition. The BEST Biomarker Role is also provided to indicate how the biomarker is used for the condition.
condition.title: Condition

evidence.text: Extracted text from evidence source that shows where biomarker data and information was found.
evidence.title: Evidence

cross_references.text: The Cross References section provides a list of database entries and links for the biomarker in other databases.
cross_references.title: Cross References

publications.text: The Publications section contains publications where the given biomarker was reported.
publications.title: Publications

tooltip.title: Source
tooltip.text: Resource ID from where biomarker data/information is extracted from (eg PMID, GWAS etc).

tooltip.title: Biomarker
tooltip.text: Change observed in assessed biomarker entity that is associated with disease (eg: 'Increased IL6 level').

tooltip.title: Specimen
tooltip.text: The type of sample in which a biomarker is identified (such as tissue, blood, etc.).

tooltip.title: LOINC code
tooltip.text: LOINC codes are assigned to lab test results.

tooltip.title: Assessed Entity Type
tooltip.text: The type of biological molecule the biomarker is (e.g protein, gene, metabolite).

tooltip.title: Assessed Biomarker Entity
tooltip.text: The entity that is being changed (e.g IL6, BRCA2).

tooltip.title: Assessed Entity ID
tooltip.text: ID from external resource. This ID is based on the assessed entity type and is used as a standard from a documented resource (NCBI Gene ID, UPKB ID).
